sentences.en: A brilliant flare popped off right over our heads.
sentences.cn: 一颗耀眼的照明弹突然在我们头顶上炸开.

sentences.en: a flare-up of tension between the two sides
sentences.cn: 双方剑拔弩张

sentences.en: A gust of wind made the candles flare.
sentences.cn: 一阵风吹得烛光摇曳.

sentences.en: Don't spill too much fat on the barbecue as it could flare up.
sentences.cn: 不要在烤肉上浇太多的油，会烧起来的。

sentences.en: Don'tspill too much fat on the barbecue as it could flare up.
sentences.cn: 不要在烤肉上浇太多的油，会烧起来的。

sentences.en: He stood ready to fire a warning flare.
sentences.cn: 他站着准备发出警告信号.

sentences.en: I saw the sudden flare of a flashlight in the darkness.
sentences.cn: 我看到手电筒在黑暗中突然闪出的亮光.

sentences.en: Indeed, last month, we looked at evidence that the last flare up occurred only a few hundred years ago.
sentences.cn: 事实上，上个月，我们在看最近一次，也就是几百年前的耀斑发生的有关证据。

sentences.en: One possibility is that the blast was like an ultra-powerful solar flare.
sentences.cn: 一种可能的原因是这种爆炸很像有超级能量的太阳耀斑。

sentences.en: Tempers flared and harsh words were exchanged.
sentences.cn: 人们大动肝火，对骂起来。

sentences.en: The candle began to flare.
sentences.cn: 烛光开始摇曳.

sentences.en: The distress flares were spotted by another ship.
sentences.cn: 遇险信号被另外一艘船发现了。

sentences.en: The fire flared into life.
sentences.cn: 火旺了起来。

sentences.en: The fire flared up again.
sentences.cn: 火又忽地旺了起来。

sentences.en: The flare flamed up again in his crooked eyes.
sentences.cn: 他那双歪眼中的火焰又燃烧起来.

sentences.en: The flare overshot its target and set light to a hotel.
sentences.cn: 信号弹越过目标,把一家旅馆照亮了.

sentences.en: The match flared and went out.
sentences.cn: 火柴闪亮了一下就熄了。

sentences.en: The match gave a flare.
sentences.cn: 火柴发出闪光.

sentences.en: The match gave a last flare.
sentences.cn: 火柴发出最后的亮光.

sentences.en: The sides of a ship flare from the keel to the deck.
sentences.cn: 船壳由龙骨向外弯曲至甲板处.

sentences.en: Their diaphanous flare symbolizes at once grace and tragedy, innocence and despair, sadness and voluptuousness.
sentences.cn: 它们半透明的闪光象征着优雅与悲剧，天真与绝望，悲伤与奢华。

sentences.en: Theory thus predicts that there will be a flare of infrared radiation.
sentences.cn: 因此,理论预言会有红外辐射耀发.

sentences.en: You need not flare up merely because I mentioned your work.
sentences.cn: 你大可不必因为我提到你的工作就动怒.
